titles.title: Just As I Am (hymn of the Church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am without one plea But that Thy blood was shed for me And that Thou bid'st me come to Thee O Lamb of God I come I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am and waiting not To rid my soul of one dark blot To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot O Lamb of God I come I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am though tossed about With many a conflict many a doubt Fightings within and fears without O Lamb of God I come I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am poor wretched blind Sight riches healing of the mind Yea all I need in Thee to find O Lamb of God I come I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am Thou wilt receive Wilt welcome pardon cleanse relieve Because Thy promise I believe O Lamb of God I come I come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just as I am Thy love unknown Hath broken every barrier down Now to be Thine yes Thine alone O Lamb of God I come I come{/lang-eng}
